statements: DELETE FROM waste_generation_reports WHERE quantity < 100 AND collection_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM waste_trends WHERE location_id = 2 AND year = 2021;
DELETE FROM waste_reports WHERE location_id = 1 AND waste_type = 'Plastic';
DELETE FROM waste_trends WHERE year = 2022 AND trend_value > 1000;
DELETE FROM Locations WHERE city = 'New York' AND region = 'East';
DELETE FROM waste_trend WHERE location_id = 3 AND trend_year = 2022;
DELETE FROM waste_trend WHERE trend_month = 2 AND trend_year = 2021;
DELETE FROM waste_generation WHERE generation_rate <= 1000 AND generation_date < '2022-01-01';
